name: Super Child Bros 3
description:
Released for the Yatendo Entertainment System (YES for short)

The black demon stole your picture book. Get it back!

You must travel through the house , the garden and then climb mt. picture book.

On your journey you will encounter insidious mice, timid snakes, furious birds and blue, rolling hedgehogs.

Passwords:

"Xeasy": start the game with 99 lives

"easy":  start the game with 10 lives

"hard":  start the game with 0 lives and only 3 hit points

"Xhard": start the game with 0 lives and only 1 hit point. Also there are no 1UPs

level list (passwords):

- "lv1-1"

- "lv1-2"

- "lv1-3"

- "lv1-4"

- "lv2-1"

- "lv2-2"
